title: Regions R and S part - c

content.question: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y=1.

frqParts.text: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y=1.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
